entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable Option to Use Content Negotiation for ProblemDetails #45159
  • ASPNETCORE_CONTENTROOT being ignored in .NET 7 #45155
  • http body writeasync size limit #45154
  • Unclear how you should respond to Parameter changing after #26230 #45152
    Discussions
  • Upgrading nuget package "Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation" from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 causes unwanted errors to be shown in api logging. #45149
  • Add a mechanism to override how Blazor's JS dynamic imports are performed #45148
    Backlog
  • GenerateClaimsAsync method in UserClaimsPrincipalFactory getting called after every 30 minutes in Blazor Server #45147
  • Web Finger (RFC7033) middleware #45143
    Discussions
  • Enable JSON format output for `user-jwts list` #45141
    8.0

Closed

  • Publish v6 packages in a way that works with the reality of NuGet today, rather than working against it #38336
  • Blazor Webassembly Project Template no longer works #44880
    Discussions
  • WithSummary and WithDescription deson't work in minimal api #45082
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Server WebSocket failed to connect behind Nginx/Ingress #45153
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM authentication back button history behavior still problematic with 3rd party IDP #45097
    Backlog
  • Lazy loaded `BlazorCustomElements.js` file does not adhere to the `loadBootResource` configuration #45104
    Backlog
  • Lack of useful debug information #44769
  • The thrown exception's message is completely useless... #44895
  • Kestrel: Connection id "XXX" application never completed. #44870
  • Blazor WebAssembly project cannot read appsettings.json file when connected with http instead of https #44900
  • Invalid SignalR version with blazor server #44961
  • ExceptionHandlerMiddleware should be able to include HTTP Headers from original requests #45137
  • UseHttpsRedirection: A post request on http redirects to get #44967

PullRequests

Created

  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-runtime
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Add route string syntax to more APIs #45146
    area-runtime
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3: Throw AddressInUseException for used port in the same process #45144
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove array allocation from multi-span header parsing #45044
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • fix DefaultPolicy unreasonable behavior. #45122
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2047598 #44686
    area-infrastructure
